gesture_double_tap_time: This function is used to set the time it takes between two touches/clicks to trigger a Double Tap Gesture event. The time is measured in seconds and has a default value of 0.16.
The time (in seconds) to set for double tap gesture event detection.
The above code checks to see if double tap time for gestures is set to 0.16 seconds and if it is not it sets it to that value.
